name: auth
description: Authorize using the AGENTOPS_API_KEY. If the API key is not provided and cannot be found in the directory, ask the user for the API key.

api_key.description: AgentOps project API key (optional if AGENTOPS_API_KEY environment variable is set)

name: get_trace
description: Get trace information and metrics by trace_id.

name: get_span
description: Get span information and metrics by span_id.

name: get_complete_trace
description: Reserved for explicit requests for COMPLETE or ALL data. Get complete trace information and metrics by trace_id.
